entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except temperature steady near plus 3 along parts of the coast.
